headline: Why Cadence Design Systems Stock Crushed It on Thursday
summary: Chip-making equipment specialist Cadence Design Systems (NASDAQ: CDNS) was targeted for a recommendation upgrade on Thursday, and investors eagerly leapt into the stock.  The company behind the upgrade was American banking powerhouse JPMorgan Chase.  The bank also cranked the price target higher to $325 per share from the preceding $300.

The company behind the upgrade was American banking powerhouse JPMorgan Chase.  The bank also cranked the price target higher to $325 per share from the preceding $300.

headline: JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) Promotes Key India Executives To Managing Directors
summary: JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) has recently introduced two notable leadership changes in its India operations, with Manish Jain and Rajiv Warrier appointed as managing directors. Over the past week, the company’s stock price increased by nearly 5%, a move largely in line with broader market trends, which saw similar gains. The executive appointments underscore JPMorgan's intention to strengthen its presence in the Indian market, potentially adding weight to the broader positive market shifts...

headline: The Turn Of The Screw. JPMorgan's Jamie Dimon Warns Trump Trade War Could See The U.S. Lose Credibility
summary: JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) CEO Jamie Dimon has fired a warning shot about President Donald Trump‘s trade war, which has put the stock market on a wild ride, unnerving investors. The Wall Street titan warned of a loss of U.S. credibility on the national stage, a recession and worse, should the trade war continue. Usually one of the more outspoken power players on Wall Street, Dimon has, until recently, been tempered in his appraisal of the president’s more controversial policies. He told CNBC in F

headline: JPMorgan promotes 227 employees to MD level in key banking division
summary: Among the newly appointed MDs, 184 are part of CIB's core businesses, including global banking, markets, payments and securities services.  The managing director title is one of the most sought-after on Wall Street and often marks a key milestone in a banker's career.  Revenue from JPMorgan's CIB unit jumped 12% in the first quarter, the bank reported earlier this month, thanks to higher fees from underwriting bond sales and advising on acquisitions.

headline: JPMorgan Sees ‘Tremendous’ Opportunity in Treasuries on Fed Cuts
summary: (Bloomberg) -- JPMorgan Asset Management says US Treasuries have more potential for gains than European government bonds because traders are underpricing the extent to which the Federal Reserve will reduce interest rates compared with the European Central Bank. headline: Best Travel Credit Card: How to choose
summary: Credit-card issuers like Chase (JPM), American Express (AXP), Capital One (COF), Wells Fargo (WFC), Bank of America (BAC), and Citibank (C) offer general travel rewards credit cards. United Airlines (UAL), Delta Air Lines (DAL), Marriott (MAR), Hilton (HLT), and Hyatt (H) offer their own credit cards, too. Yahoo Finance Senior Credit Card Reporter Ben Walker breaks down how to choose the right card for you.
